added.feature: float, int, Vector2, Vector2Int, Vector3, Vector3Int, Color, Rect type modifiers implemented.
Ref mode for value type modifiers implemented.
GameObject, Transform and RectTransform mutable modifiers implemented.
Set, Add, Sub, Comp, Prod, Div, Mod, Power, Root, Square, Cube, Square Root, Cube Root, Log, LogTen, LogN, Exp modifiers implemented.
Inverse, Swap, Flat, SetOne, Neg, Round, Floor, Ceil, Abs, AbsNeg, Sign modifiers implemented.
Clamp, Clamp Range, Clamp Pos, Clamp Neg, Clamp Max, Clamp Min, Clamp Abs, Clamp Abs One, Clamp Bin modifiers implemented.
Wrap, Wrap Range, Wrap Max, Wrap Min, Wrap Abs, Wrap Abs One, Wrap Bin modifiers implemented.
